author: goughes
body:
This PR adds an `oracle19.spec` for the Oracle 19 client that is based off of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/6958. `py3-cx-oracle.spec` is also updated to Require the new oracle19 rpm.

Currently only the py3 wmagent has a dependency on `py3-cx-oracle`. After merging this, any new agents that are deployed would pull in the new Oracle client.

To test, I built the RPMS and deployed a py3 wmagent, verified Oracle connectivity and ran multiple successful workflows.

cc'ing @amaltaro
title: Add oracle19 spec and update py3-cx-oracle to use oracle19
